channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Riyadh’s COP16: A Milestone In The Fight Against Drought, Experts Say
item.description: Last month at COP16 in Riyad, world leaders and experts discussed initiatives on how to tackle the global fight against drought and desertification.

item.title: The Wiretap: Telegram Handing Data On Thousands Of Users To Law Enforcement Across The World
item.description: Telegram founder's arrest appears to have had one significant impact: worrying those using the platform for child exploitation.

item.title: The value of artifacts

item.title: Tech-Based Developments With Big Implications For Product Businesses
item.description: In the near future, technology is poised to revolutionize the way companies create, market, sell and deliver products to consumers.

item.title: 4 Steam Deck Competitors To Watch For In 2025
item.description: Looking for a new gaming handheld in 2025? Here are four Steam Deck competitors announced at CES 2025 to add to your shortlist.

item.title: Working with problems
